amendment.description: To require a Department of Defense study of the adequacy of the beryllium industrial base.

vote.text: Amendment SA 816 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 816 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Bennett. (consideration: CR S6898-6899; text: CR S6898) To require a Department of Defense study of the adequacy of the beryllium industrial base.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 816 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Bennett.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 816 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
